mapper.select: select room_id as roomId, name from zs_room_info where department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into zs_room_info (room_id, department_id, `name`, create_time, `status`) values (#{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
